import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import setAuthToken from'./utils/setAuthToken';var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];// TODO: default export store
export var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));/*
  NOTE: set up a store subscription listener
  to store the users token in localStorage
 */ /*
  initialize current state from redux store for subscription comparison
  preventing undefined error
 */var currentState=store.getState();store.subscribe(function(){// keep track of the previous and current state to compare changes
var previousState=currentState;currentState=store.getState();// if the token changes set the value in localStorage and axios headers
if(previousState.auth.token!==currentState.auth.token){var token=currentState.auth.token;setAuthToken(token);}});
